h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: The next Mind Core is also at the Rockrest Flat Shrine in Fright Cliff in Yellow Wind Ridge. This time, from the Shrine, go left and defeat the Stone Vanguard to get one.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 8'.
The content is as follows:
The next Mind Core is also at the Rockrest Flat Shrine in Fright Cliff in Yellow Wind Ridge. This time, from the Shrine, go left and defeat the Stone Vanguard to get one.
